Spice up your posts with emoticons ("smileys")!

To disable emoticons in your post, for example to write ":-)" instead of , begin your post with #nosmileys. You can also check the box "Disable Smileys" when you post to make it easier :)
For This Type This
:-) :)
;-)  
:-D :D
;)  
:-( :(
For This Type This
):(  
:-O :O
???  
8-) 8)
